projects.name: MPM
projects.description: Password management application written in python that uses the cryptography library to encrypt user data and generate cryptographically safe passwords.

projects.name: InGen
projects.description: A PDF invoice generator that stores product catalgue data for invoice generation using sqlite.

projects.name: Camradia
projects.description: A wellness and commuity organization website that uses Javascript and React to facilitate connections between like-minded people and encourages them to explore their interests and the outside world.

projects.name: OpenScientia
projects.description: OpenScientia is a user-friendly web application that allows you to access data directly from NASA archives. Here, you can explore various types of data, knowledge, and information from NASA with just a few clicks.
